title: GRAND CENTRAL OYSTER BAR
seo_description: A trip to the city is not complete without sipping down a dozen oysters at Grand Central Oyster Bar. A favorite of locals and tourists alike, this underground oyster bar is the best place to observe the buzz of Grand Central Terminal from a safe distance at the counter and with a beer in hand.
contents:
Oysters 
89 E 42nd St|
walk: 21 minutes

A trip to the city is not complete without sipping down a dozen oysters at Grand Central Oyster Bar. A favorite of locals and tourists alike, this underground oyster bar is the best place to observe the buzz of Grand Central Terminal from a safe distance at the counter and with a beer in hand.
